sentence.Network_en: For the older child, measure from earlobe to bridge of nose to xiphoid.

sentence.Network_en: The light on the earlobe flashes and flashes at the same time.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时耳垂上的灯一闪一闪.

sentence.Network_en: Beijing has a very inconspicuous alley - earlobe alley.

entry.def: Your earlobes are the soft parts at the bottom of your ears.

means.word_mean: 1. the fleshy pendulous part of the external human ear
